name: DiGyan
overview:
A complete Learning Experience

DiGyan is a place for complete learning experience. DiGyan stands for “Digital Gyan” and “Distribute Gyan”. Gyan is a Hindi word (Devanagari script) which literary means ‘knowledge’. DiGyan.com offers online courses on variety of topics (specially science and technology) via high-quality videos and e-books. The videos are prepared by experts of respective fields. DiGyan technology is the way we have built our course contents. DiGyan encourages the implementation Information and Communication Technology (ICT) in education. DiGyan’s aim is to give complete learning experience to every student. Student’s special training includes modules on learning, career, skills, innovation, leadership and ethics. The focus is on three basic aspects which includes teaching curriculum stuffs with digital aids, teaching student “how to learn faster?” and evoking and igniting student’s creativity and innovative ideas.

Key benefits of DiGyan courses

  • High quality course contents
  • Contents are regularly updated and new contents are added
  • Courses available with exercises
  • Ability to interact with course instructors
  • Best quality at low cost
  • Ocean of knowledge helps in acquiring new skills
  • Learn anytime, anywhere (you just need desktops, tablets or smartphones)

We also offer DiGyan Classroom, DiGyan Campus, DiGyan Tutor and DiGyan Social services.
